title: Holy Warriors: A Modern History of the Crusades
description:
Holy Warriors: A Modern History of the Crusades - Jonathan Phillips [epub]

Using songs, sermons, narratives, and letters of the period, he reveals how the success of the First Crusade inspired generations of kings to campaign for their own vainglory and set down a marker for the knights of Europe, men who increasingly blurred the boundaries between chivalry and crusading. In the Muslim world, early attempts to call a jihad fell upon deaf ears until the charisma of the Sultan Saladin brought the struggle to a climax.
